about me

Things about me

I love to work with code, but also love to work with people. I believe in team work and always willing to hear the ideas from other brilliant individules. I like to stay optimistic, things aren't so bad if we could find an angle to see the bright side. I would describe myself as go getter type of person. I never easily give up on my goals. Fun fact about me, I have been working out at 6 in the morning since June of 2019 and its still counting.
